lemma splitit: " (index xs q < i \<and> i < length xs \<Longrightarrow> P) \<Longrightarrow> (index xs q = i \<Longrightarrow> P) \<Longrightarrow> (index xs q - n \<le> i \<and> i < index xs q \<Longrightarrow> P) \<Longrightarrow> (i < index xs q - n \<Longrightarrow> P) \<Longrightarrow> (i < length xs \<Longrightarrow> P)"
